name: Journal of the Bombay Natural History Society

description.@value: The Journal of the Bombay Natural History Society (also JBNHS) is a natural history journal published several times a year by the Bombay Natural History Society. First published in January 1886, and published with only a few interruptions since, the JBNHS is one of the best-known journals in the fields of natural history, conservation, and biodiversity research.
Journal of the Bombay Natural History Society, (abreviado J. Bombay Nat. Hist. Soc.),​ es una revista con ilustraciones y descripciones botánicas que e editada en Bombay desde el año 1886.
